name: Foundation
description: Get the basics working: install the framework correctly and establish how to verify it. This must complete before anything else is trustworthy. Human checkpoint: Can I install the framework? Can I test things?

tasks.description: Establish testability foundations for the framework itself. The framework is unusual â€” it's prompt files, a skill, directory conventions, and an orchestrator. Standard testing approaches don't directly apply. The key mechanisms that need verification: orchestrator dispatch, role prompt behavior, build cycle flow (including termination), and self-installation correctness. The test infrastructure should be minimal but must actually verify behavior, not just structure.
tasks.outcome: A verification approach exists for the framework's key mechanisms: orchestrator dispatch, role prompt behavior, build cycle flow, self-installation correctness
tasks.verification: At least one automated check exists for each key mechanism. The approach is documented so future tasks know how to add tests.

tasks.description: Update install.sh for the new framework structure. The script currently copies old-style files that no longer match the framework layout. After this task, install.sh creates the correct directory structure for any target project, including the self-install case (when the target is ralph-docker itself). Backward compatibility with the old layout is NOT required. Valuable content in PRD_REFINE.md should not be lost during the transition.
tasks.outcome: Running install.sh on a fresh project creates the full .ralph/, ralph-context/, .ralph-tasks/ structure with all framework files and skills
tasks.verification: Install into a temp directory. Verify all expected files exist. Verify .ralph/ matches framework/ contents. Verify the self-install case works.

tasks.description: Clean up legacy artifacts from pre-restructure. The repo has files from the old flat layout that no longer match the framework structure. Valuable content should be preserved in its correct framework location; everything else should be removed. No orphaned references to old-style paths or formats should remain.
tasks.outcome: Legacy artifacts removed or migrated. No orphaned files from the old layout remain. Any valuable content preserved in its new framework-appropriate location.
tasks.verification: Root templates/ directory removed (or emptied to .gitkeep if convention requires it). .claude/skills/refine/ updated to reference current PRD format. No file references old-style paths (RALPH_PROMPT.md, testsPassing, etc.).
